extension.name: No Contribution Receipt
extension.description: This civicrm extension unsets the Send Receipt? checkbox when adding/editing a contribution so it doesn't send a email automatically.
extension.comments:
In reply to a stackexchange question - http://civicrm.stackexchange.com/questions/7071/how-to-disable-email-notifications-when-confirming-a-donation-in-civ$
